ygData.subject: RE: Stein - No more - Addendum
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree with both your opinion on the ease of acquiring the Glowing Stein and that Verant s proposed fix is not a good idea. I like your idea of making
ygData.messageBody:
I agree with both your opinion on the ease of acquiring the Glowing Stein
and that Verant's proposed fix is not a good idea. I like your idea of
making existing ones no drop and changing the quest reward. However, I don't
believe you can put the GS in either hand right now. I tried to equip both
the Glowing Stein and my Crude Stein right after I got my GS, and couldn't
equip them both.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tim Borelli [SMTP:timb@...]
> Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 9:31 AM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Stein - No more - Addendum
>
> From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>
>
> i'm sorry, but people who are complaining about this change... please shut
> up about it. it's a freaking plus 10 INT, plus 5 DEX, plus 20 Sv Disease
> item. in other words, an AWESOME item. it was too too too easy to get, and
> we could hold it in either hand. there was NO penalty for using/having it.
> i think it's a good idea that they are going to introduce some sort of
> penalty for having it.
>
> do i think it's a good idea that they have to change it now? no. they
> should have thought of it before they made the quest so damn easy. if they
> had made it as hard as the GBS to get, then i wouldnt expect there to be
> any penalty for having it. but since it was easy as hell, i would have.
>
> my idea is to leave the ones that are in the world as is, except make them
> no drop. then anyone else who does the quest gets the new one, not the old
> one. THAT would be the smart thing to do.
>
> sorry for the rant.
>
> Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 29th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule
> Qoronita, 9th level Erudite Enchantress on Cazic-Thule
> (let's see who reaches 30 first, heh)
> -------------------
> tim borrelli
> computer character animator and crackhead extraordinaire
> Volition, Inc.
> timmyland@...
> http://www.timmyland.com
